function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Failure to consider individualized building layouts and ventilation frequencies for disease control","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to oversight of specific environmental factors","Mitigation":"Conduct thorough environmental assessments and tailor disease control measures to individual building layouts and ventilation frequencies","Technologies":"Simulation systems for customized environmental modeling and disease spread analysis","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and staff","Owner":"Facility management, disease control authorities"},{"Description":"Overwhelming users with too many configurable options","Impact":"Difficulties in navigating and utilizing the system effectively, leading to potential misuse or errors","Mitigation":"Provide user training and support, simplify user interface, and implement custom grouping and parameter graph generation features","Technologies":"User interface design, customization tools, and data visualization applications","People":"System users, facility managers, and decision makers","Owner":"System developers, facility management"}]}
